Package com.scheduler.client.controller

Class AppointmentController

java.lang.Object
com.scheduler.client.controller.AppointmentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddAppointmentController, ModifyAppointmentController
public abstract class AppointmentController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Abstract controller class that provides common functionality to (is the Parent of) AddAppointmentController and ModifyAppointmentController. The view file that this class controls is AppointmentForm.fxml.
Author:
Dillon Christensen

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Called to initialize a controller after its root element has been completely processed. Initializes class members, set up dropdowns, set up time spinners, and event handlers.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resources - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

    • setupSubmit

      protected void setupSubmit() throws RequiredFieldException, AppointmentNotBusinessHoursException, AppointmentOverlapException, EndBeforeStartException
      Sets up all the common submit button functionality between child implementations of handleSubmitBtn(ActionEvent). Checks that the required fields are completed, handles and formats the date and time inputs into usable data for ZonedDateTime and Timestamp storage, and formats that date/time data into correct forms for the necessary zones.
      Throws:
      RequiredFieldException - if required fields are not completed
      AppointmentNotBusinessHoursException - if appointment does not fall within ETC business hours
      AppointmentOverlapException - if appointment time overlaps with appointment of the same customer
      EndBeforeStartException

    • handleSubmitBtn

      protected abstract void handleSubmitBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)

    • resetFlags

      private void resetFlags()
      Resets all field flags to not be visible.

    • checkForNoEmptyRequiredFields

      private boolean checkForNoEmptyRequiredFields()
      Checks whether all required form fields are completed. Flags uncompleted fields and provides an error message if exception is thrown.

    • setupSystemDefaultZDT

      private ZonedDateTime setupSystemDefaultZDT(javafx.scene.control.Spinner<Integer> hourSpinner, javafx.scene.control.Spinner<Integer> minuteSpinner, javafx.scene.control.Spinner<String> meridiemSpinner, javafx.scene.control.DatePicker picker)
      Sets up a ZonedDateTime from the date and time form input fields, zoned to ZoneId.systemDefault() .
      Parameters:
      hourSpinner - Spinner with value of hour in standard (12 Hour) format
      minuteSpinner - Spinner with value of minute
      meridiemSpinner - Spinner with value of meridiem (AM/PM)
      picker - DatePicker of selected date
      Returns:
      newly created ZonedDateTime from user input data

    • flagDateTimeFields

      private void flagDateTimeFields()
      Flags all date and time fields
